title: Short-Intensive Course for Developing English Speaking Skills in Scientific Contexts

context.prior_knowledge: Core scientific terminology and intermediate-level English communication proficiency
context.additional_context: VR-based simulation learning environment for science field managers/leaders, emphasizing improvement of English presentation and discussion skills required in workplace settings

learning_goals: Learners can achieve the ability to deliver a 5-minute English presentation using 50 specialized science terms.

Over one week, learners perform ≥10 English role-plays (meetings, negotiations, presentations) with peers/customers in VR simulation environments, achieving ≥70% scores in each of four rubric items (pronunciation, fluency, business vocabulary usage, situational responsiveness) to enhance real-time communication skills
Learners can present and perform Q&A for one English scientific research paper through project-based assessment.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
